trans-unit.source: Forces the attributed object to be created in the context of the creator, if possible.

If the context attributes of the attributed object conflict with those of the context of the creator, a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException?displayProperty=fullName> is thrown when an attempt is made to create the object.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.MustRunInClientContextAttribute"></xref> class, requiring creation of the object in the context of the creator.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.MustRunInClientContextAttribute"></xref> class, optionally not creating the object in the context of the creator.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create the object in the context of the creator; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the attributed object is to be created in the context of the creator.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is to be created in the context of the creator; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
